metadata.inclusion: press the Z-Wave button 1 time in the door sensor when the Z-Wave controller sends the instructions for inclusion or Add new devices.
metadata.exclusion: press the Z-Wave button 1 time in the door sensor when the Z-Wave controller sends the instructions for exclusion or Remove devices
metadata.reset:
Press the button 6 times the device will send the reset notification to the list node in the group 1 and erases the device memory, when the light flash is resetting success
"Use this procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable."
